svg.style: background: transparent; background-color: transparent; color-scheme: light dark;
svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/134.0.0.0 Safari/537.36" version="26.1.1"> <diagram id="C5RBs43oDa-KdzZeNtuy" name="Page-1"> <mxGraphModel dx="1877" dy="557" grid="1" gridSize="10" guides="1" tooltips="1" connect="1" arrows="1" fold="1" page="1" pageScale="1" pageWidth="827" pageHeight="1169" math="0" shadow="0"> <root> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-0" /> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-0" value="" style="whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;aspect=fixed;fillColor=#f5f5f5;strokeColor=#666666;fontColor=#333333;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="-20" y="40" width="850" height="850" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-7" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-1" target="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-2" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-1" value="<div><strong data-end="23" data-start="0"><font style="font-size: 24px;">User Interface (UI)</font></strong><br data-end="26" data-start="23"><br><font style="font-size: 14px;">Displays menu &amp; user options<br data-end="57" data-start="54"><br>Accepts user input<br data-end="78" data-start="75"><br>Shows encryption/decryption results<br data-end="116" data-start="113"><br>Handles errors &amp; warnings</font><b></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#dae8fc;strokeColor=#6c8ebf;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="120" width="560" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-8" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-2" target="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-3" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-2" value="<div><strong data-end="172" data-start="145"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Application Logic Layer</font></strong><br data-end="175" data-start="172"><br><font style="font-size: 14px;">Processes user input<br data-end="198" data-start="195"><br>Routes actions (Encryption, Decryption, Key Management)<br data-end="256" data-start="253"><br>Manages cryptographic operations<br data-end="291" data-start="288"><br>Handles system flow &amp; decision-making</font><b></b></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#d5e8d4;strokeColor=#82b366;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="125" y="320" width="565" height="170" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-11" style="edgeStyle=orthogonalEdgeStyle;rounded=0;orthogonalLoop=1;jettySize=auto;html=1;exitX=0.5;exitY=1;exitDx=0;exitDy=0;entryX=0.5;entryY=0;entryDx=0;entryDy=0;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" source="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-3" target="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-4" edge="1"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-3" value="<div><strong data-end="364" data-start="332"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Cryptographic Security Layer</font></strong><br data-end="367" data-start="364"><br><font style="font-size: 14px;">AES Encryption &amp; Decryption<br data-end="397" data-start="394"><br>RSA Key Pair Generation<br data-end="423" data-start="420"><br>Diffie-Hellman (DH) Key Exchange<br data-end="458" data-start="455"><br>Key Revocation &amp; Validation</font></div>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#fff2cc;strokeColor=#d6b656;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="125" y="530" width="565" height="160" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-4" value="<strong data-end="511" data-start="489"><font style="font-size: 24px;">Data Storage Layer</font></strong><br data-end="514" data-start="511"><br><font style="font-size: 14px;">Secure Key Storage (AES, RSA, DH Keys)<br data-end="555" data-start="552"><br>Encrypted Data Storage<br data-end="580" data-start="577"><br>Logs &amp; Audit Trails</font>" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;fillColor=#f8cecc;strokeColor=#b85450;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="127.5" y="730" width="560" height="150" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="5dRAvEgm8fGgul96ndXJ-6" value="<h1 style="margin-top: 0px;">System Architecture and Design</h1>" style="text;html=1;whiteSpace=wrap;overflow=hidden;rounded=1;sketch=1;curveFitting=1;jiggle=2;glass=1;shadow=1;fillColor=#e1d5e7;strokeColor=#9673a6;align=center;" parent="WIyWlLk6GJQsqaUBKTNV-1" vertex="1"> <mxGeometry x="130" y="60" width="560" height="40" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(218, 232, 252), rgb(29, 41, 59)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(108, 142, 191), rgb(92, 121, 163));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 165px; margin-left: 151px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font:
Displays menu & user options
Accepts user input
Shows encryption/decryption results
Handles errors & warnings

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(213, 232, 212), rgb(31, 47, 30)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(130, 179, 102), rgb(68, 110, 44));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 563px; height: 1px; padding-top: 365px; margin-left: 146px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font:
Processes user input
Routes actions (Encryption, Decryption, Key Management)
Manages cryptographic operations
Handles system flow & decision-making

path.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(0, 0, 0), rgb(255, 255, 255));

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 242, 204), rgb(40, 29, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(214, 182, 86), rgb(109, 81, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 563px; height: 1px; padding-top: 570px; margin-left: 146px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.font:
AES Encryption & Decryption
RSA Key Pair Generation
Diffie-Hellman (DH) Key Exchange
Key Revocation & Validation

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 206, 204), rgb(81, 45, 43)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(184, 84, 80), rgb(215, 129, 126));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 765px; margin-left: 149px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
div.font:
Secure Key Storage (AES, RSA, DH Keys)
Encrypted Data Storage
Logs & Audit Trails

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 558px; height: 1px; padding-top: 27px; margin-left: 151px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; max-height: 36px; overflow: hidden; color: #000000;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#000000, #ffffff); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
